Registartion.¶

Man registration.¶

class account.views.registration.RegisterMan(**kwargs)¶

Man registration.

Genetating random password.

Creating record in DB (account.models.UserProfile).

Sending email using template (MailTemplates.objects.get(alias=’man-registration’)).

METHOD: POST

URL: account/register/man

Input:

{email: "email@gmail.com"}

Output:

{"status":0,"message":"Ok"}

Woman registartion.¶

class account.views.registration.RegisterWoman(**kwargs)¶

Woman registration.

Creating a new record with the json was taken in the Moderation model.

moderation.utils.woman.add_woman_profile(json)

METHOD: POST

URL: account/register/woman

Input:

{
    about_me: "csdcsdc"
    alkohol: 22
    birthday: "2019-12-09T22:00:00.000Z"
    children: 29
    city: "dcsdcsd"
    constitution: 18
    email: "cewc@ddd.dd"
    eye_color: 9
    goal: "sdc sdcsd"
    hair_color: 6
    height: 41
    hobby: 35
    images: [,…]
    job: "sdcsdc sdc"
    language: [false, false, false]
    lookingfor: "csdcsdc"
    marital: 15
    name: "ewcwe"
    photo: "C:\fakepath\Main.jpg"
    race: 33
    religion: 38
    smoking: 25
    weight: 12
    images: [
    0: "data:image/jpeg;base64,/9j/4AAQSkZJRgABAQAAAQABAAD..."
    ]
}

Output:

{"status":0,"message":"Ok", "id": 2}

Agency registartion.¶

class account.views.registration.RegisterAgencyView(**kwargs)¶

Agency registration.

Creating a new record with the json was taken in the Moderation model.

moderation.utils.agency.add_agency_profile(json)

METHOD: POST

URL: account/register/agency

Input:

{
    address: ".."
    city: ".."
    count_woman: "...."
    country: "..."
    email: "ddsds@xxs.dd"
    images: [
    0: "data:image/jpeg;base64,/9j/4AAQSkZJRgABAQAAAQABAAD..."
    ]
    login: "..."
    name: "..."
    name_boss: "..."
    password: "..."
    phone1: "..."
    phone2: "...."
    photo: "C:\fakepath\AP_16274338441108.jpg"
    skype: "sacas"
    working_time: "412412"
}

Output.

{"status":0,"message":"Ok", "id": 2}
